result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Francisco NMI Salgado-Cobos

records.addlTxt: 4:08 PM Defendant Francisco NMI Salgado-Cobos not in court.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court notes previous non appearance. State requests court complete forfeiture. Court orders bond forfeited.

4:17 PM Defendant Francisco NMI Salgado-Cobos not in court.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin. Case was called earlier in the day with Interpreter and Def. did not appear. Court reviews case history of 22GF220. State moves to forfeit $1,000.00 and requests warrant for $3,000.00 or body for the State of Wisconsin. Notes Def. posted $1,500.00 on prior case no 22CF154. 22CF157 Court authorizes warrant in the amount of $3,000.00 or body for the State of Wisconsin and moves to forfeit bond of $1,000.00.
No driving without a valid driver's license.

2:00 p.m./Room 203. Bail Bond Hearing.  Elizabeth Gebert appears for the State of Wisconsin. Def. Francisco Salgado-Cobos appears by video, in custody, from Langlade County Jail. Interpreter Susan Rascon appears. All appearances are by Zoom. Susan Rascon, sworn in as interpreter. Criminal complaint not filed. State recites anticipated charges: felony bail jumping and operating without a valid license as a 2nd offense within 3 years. State recommends $1,000 cash bond with condition no driving a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Def. questions Court, heard on bond and ability to pay. Remarks by the Court. Court orders $1,000 cash bond with condition as requested. Initial appearance Aug. 29, 2022 at 1:30 p.m.

citations.chargeDescr: Operate w/o Valid License (2nd w/in 3 yrs)
